reasoning: Classic Kaposi's sarcoma incidence estimated at 1.5 per 100k person-years based on SEER data and epidemiological studies from 1975-2005 period. Predominantly affects elderly Mediterranean and Jewish populations with significant geographic variation.
source: Chang Y et al. (1994). Identification of herpesvirus-like DNA sequences in AIDS-associated Kaposi's sarcoma. Science. 266(5192):1865-1869; SEER Cancer Registry epidemiological data 1975-2005
